titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, December 13, 1949

mods.tableOfContents: Marland Aitson - "Toward Higher Education" (Kiowa). Carol Botone - "Religious Education" (Kiowa). Aitson and Botone - A Kiowa Hymn. Lois Jimmy - Business School (Mississippi Choctaw). Victor and Lois - A Choctaw Hymn. Margaret Yahola - Home Economics (Seminole). Lucille Stidham - Religious Education Editor (Creek). Margaret and Lucille - Creek Hymn. Ray Arkeketa - "Preparation for the Future" (Pawnee-Otoe). Victor Kaneubbe - Scripture (Christmas). Christmas Carols - Group.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
